Sutras with Expert Validation: 0

Detailed Analysis by Sutra:

Sutra 1:
Original Text: atha yogānuśāsanam 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  atha → ['tha', 'a']
  yogānuśāsana → ['yogānuśāsana']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  atha:
    atha → ['tha', 'a']
  yogānuśāsanam:
    yogānuśāsana → ['yogānuśāsana']

------------------

Full Line Analysis:
------------------

  draṣṭu → ['draṣṭu']

  hāna → ['hāna']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  tadā:
    tadā → ['tadā']

    draṣṭṛ → ['draṣṭṛ']
  svarūpe:
    svarūpa → ['sva', 'rūpa']
  'vasthānam:
    avasthāna → ['ava', 'sthāna']

Sutra 29:
Original Text: tataḥ pratyakcetanādhigamo 'py antarāyābhāvaś ca 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  tata → ['tata']
  pratyakcetana → ['cetana', 'pratyak']
  adhigama → ['adhi', 'gama']
  apya → ['pya', 'a']
  ap → ['p', 'a']
  antarāya → ['āya', 'antar']
  antara → ['ntara', 'a']
  abhāva → ['bhāva', 'a']
  ca → ['ca']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  tataḥ:
    tata → ['tata']
  pratyakcetanādhigamo:
    pratyakcetana → ['cetana', 'pratyak']
    adhigama → ['adhi', 'gama']
  'py:
    api → ['pi', 'a']
    apya → ['pya', 'a']
    ap → ['p', 'a']
  antarāyābhāvaś:
    antarāya → ['āya', 'antar']
    antara → ['ntara', 'a']
    abhāva → ['bhāva', 'a']
  ca:
    ca → ['ca']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------
Full-line total segments: 9
Word-by-word total segments: 10
Note: The two approaches differ by 1 segments

================================================================================

Sutra 30:
Original Text: vyādhistyānasaṃśayapramādālasyāviratibhrāntidarśanālabdhabhūmikatvānavasthitatvāni cittavikṣepās te 'ntarāyāḥ 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  vyādhī → ['vy', 'dhī', 'ā']
  vyādhi → ['vyādhi']
  styāna → ['styāna']
  saṃśaya → ['śaya', 'saṃ']
  pramāda → ['da', 'pra', 'mā']

  ālasya → ['ālasya']
  avirati → ['virati', 'a']
  bhrāntidarśana → ['darśana', 'bhrānti']

  anavasthitatva → ['avasthita', 'tva', 'an']
  cittavikṣepa → ['vikṣepa', 'citta']

  tad → ['ta', 'd']
  yuṣmad → ['yuṣmad']

    vyādhī → ['vy', 'dhī', 'ā']
    vyādhi → ['vyādhi']
    styāna → ['styāna']

Sutra 51:
Original Text: tasyāpi nirodhe sarvanirodhān nirbījaḥ samādhiḥ 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  ta → ['ta']
  tad → ['ta', 'd']
  apya → ['pya', 'a']
  ap → ['p', 'a']
  nirodha → ['ni', 'rodha']
  sarva → ['sa', 'rva']
  nirbīja → ['bīja', 'nir']
  samādhi → ['sam', 'ādhi']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  tasyāpi:
    ta → ['ta']
    tad → ['ta', 'd']
    apya → ['pya', 'a']
    ap → ['p', 'a']
  nirodhe:
    nirodha → ['ni', 'rodha']
  sarvanirodhān:
    sarva → ['sa', 'rva']
    nirodha → ['ni', 'rodha']
  nirbījaḥ:
    nirbīja → ['bīja', 'nir']
  samādhiḥ:
    samādhi → ['sam', 'ādhi']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------
Full-line total segments: 8
Word-by-word total segments: 9
Note: The two approaches differ by 1 segments

================================================================================

Sutra 74:
Original Text: svasvāmiśaktyoḥ svarūpopalabdhihetuḥ saṃyogaḥ 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  sva → ['sva']
  svāmi → ['svāmi']
  śakty → ['śakty']
  svarūpa → ['sva', 'rūpa']
  upalabdhi → ['labdhi', 'upa']
  hetu → ['hetu']
  saṃyoga → ['yoga', 'saṃ']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  svasvāmiśaktyoḥ:
    su → ['su']
    asva → ['sva', 'a']
    amin → ['amin']
    śakti → ['kti', 'śakti', 'śa']
  svarūpopalabdhihetuḥ:
    svarūpa → ['sva', 'rūpa']
    upalabdhi → ['labdhi', 'upa']
    hetu → ['hetu']
    hetṛ → ['hetṛ']
  saṃyogaḥ:
    saṃyoga → ['yoga', 'saṃ']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------
Full-line total segments: 7
Word-by-word total segments: 9
Note: The two approaches differ by 2 segments

================================================================================

Sutra 85:
Original Text: vitarkā hiṃsādayaḥ kṛtakāritānumoditā lobhakrodhamohapūrvakā mṛdumadhyādhimātrā duḥkhājñānānantaphalā iti pratipakṣabhāvanam 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  vitarkā → ['vitarkā']
  hiṃsa → ['ṃsa', 'hi']
  adaya → ['daya', 'a']
  kṛtaka → ['kṛtaka']
  aritā → ['tā', 'ri', 'a']
  aritṛ → ['aritṛ']
  anumodita → ['anu', 'modita']
  lobha → ['lobha']
  krodha → ['dha', 'kro']
  moha → ['ha', 'mo']
  pūrvaka → ['pūrvaka']
  mṛdumadhyādhimātra → ['mṛdu', 'madhyādhimātra']

---------------------

    vi → ['vi']
    tarkā → ['tarkā']
  hiṃsādayaḥ:
    hiṃsa → ['ṃsa', 'hi']
    aya → ['ya', 'a']
    ayas → ['yas', 'a']
  kṛtakāritānumoditā:
    kṛta → ['kṛta']
    kṛ → ['kṛ']
    kārita → ['kārita']
    anumodita → ['anu', 'modita']

    krodha → ['dha', 'kro']

    duḥkha → ['duḥkha']
    ajñāna → ['jñāna', 'a']
    ananta → ['anta', 'an']
    phala → ['pha', 'la']
  iti:
    iti → ['iti']
  pratipakṣabhāvanam:
    pratipakṣa → ['pakṣa', 'prati']
    bhāvana → ['bhā', 'vana']

    śaithilya → ['śaithilya']

    samāpatti → ['sam', 'āpatti']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------
Full-line total segments: 4
Word-by-word total segments: 4

Sutra 101:

  sūkṣma → ['sūkṣma']

Sutra 123:
Original Text: śabdārthapratyayānām itaretarādhyāsāt saṃkaras tatpravibhāgasaṃyamāt sarvabhūtarutajñānam

  śabdārtha → ['śabdārtha']
  pratyaya → ['pratyaya']
  itaretara → ['itaretara']
  adhyāsa → ['āsa', 'adhy']

    śabdārtha → ['śabdārtha']

    sarvabhūta → ['sarva', 'bhūta']

Sutra 124:
Original Text: saṃskārasākṣātkaraṇāt pūrvajātijñānam 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  saṃskāra → ['skāra', 'saṃ']
  sākṣāt → ['t', 'sākṣā']
  sākṣa → ['sākṣa']
  karaṇa → ['raṇa', 'ka']
  pūrvajāti → ['pūrva', 'jāti']
  jñāna → ['jñāna']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  saṃskārasākṣātkaraṇāt:
    saṃskāra → ['skāra', 'saṃ']
    sākṣātkaraṇa → ['karaṇa', 'sākṣāt']
  pūrvajātijñānam:
    pūrvajāti → ['pūrva', 'jāti']
    jñāna → ['jñāna']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------
Full-line total segments: 6
Word-by-word total segments: 4
Note: The two approaches differ by 2 segments

================================================================================

Sutra 125:
Original Text: pratyayasya paracittajñānam 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  pratyaya → ['pratyaya']
  para → ['pa', 'ra']

  jñāna → ['jñāna']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  pratyayasya:
    pratyaya → ['pratyaya']
  paracittajñānam:
    paracittajñāna → ['jñāna', 'citta', 'para']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------

Word-by-word total segments: 2
Note: The two approaches differ by 2 segments

================================================================================

Sutra 126:
Original Text: na ca tat sālambanaṃ tasyāviṣayībhūtatvāt 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  na → ['na']
  ca → ['ca']
  tad → ['ta', 'd']
  sālambana → ['sālambana']
  ta → ['ta']
  viṣayībhūta → ['viṣayī', 'bhūta']
  tva → ['tva']
  at → ['at']
  ad → ['ad']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  na:
    na → ['na']
  ca:
    ca → ['ca']
  tat:
    tat → ['tat']
    tad → ['ta', 'd']
  sālambanaṃ:
    sālambana → ['sālambana']
  tasyāviṣayībhūtatvāt:
    ta → ['ta']
    tad → ['ta', 'd']
    aviṣa → ['viṣa', 'a']
    bhūtatva → ['tva', 'bhūta']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------

Sutra 127:
Original Text: kāyarūpasaṃyamāt tadgrāhyaśaktistambhe cakṣuḥprakāśāsaṃprayoge 'ntardhānam 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  ka → ['ka']
  kāya → ['kāya']
  rūpa → ['rūpa']
  saṃyama → ['yama', 'saṃ']
  tad → ['ta', 'd']
  grāhya → ['grāhya']
  śakti → ['kti', 'śakti', 'śa']
  stambha → ['stambha']
  stambhi → ['stambhi']
  stambh → ['stambh']
  cakṣu → ['ca', 'kṣu']
  cakṣus → ['ca', 'kṣus']
  prakāśa → ['kāśa', 'pra']
  samprayoga → ['sam', 'prayoga']
  antardhāna → ['antar', 'dhāna']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  kāyarūpasaṃyamāt:
    ka → ['ka']
    kāya → ['kāya']
    rūpa → ['rūpa']
    saṃyama → ['yama', 'saṃ']
  tadgrāhyaśaktistambhe:
    tad → ['ta', 'd']
    grāhya → ['grāhya']
    śakti → ['kti', 'śakti', 'śa']
    stambha → ['stambha']
    stambhi → ['stambhi']
    stambh → ['stambh']
  cakṣuḥprakāśāsaṃprayoge:
    cakṣu → ['ca', 'kṣu']
    cakṣus → ['ca', 'kṣus']
    prakāśa → ['kāśa', 'pra']
    samprayoga → ['sam', 'prayoga']
  'ntardhānam:
    antardhāna → ['antar', 'dhāna']

Comparison Metrics:

Sutra 128:
Original Text: sopakramaṃ nirupakramaṃ ca karma tatsaṃyamād aparāntajñānam ariṣṭebhyo vā 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  sopakrama → ['sopakrama']
  nirupakrama → ['upakrama', 'nir']
  ca → ['ca']
  karma → ['karma']
  tad → ['ta', 'd']
  saṃyama → ['yama', 'saṃ']
  ad → ['ad']
  aparāntajñāna → ['aparānta', 'jñāna']
  ariṣṭa → ['riṣṭa', 'a']
  ibhya → ['i', 'bhya']
  vā → ['vā']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  sopakramaṃ:
    sopakrama → ['sopakrama']
  nirupakramaṃ:
    nirupakrama → ['upakrama', 'nir']
  ca:
    ca → ['ca']
  karma:
    karma → ['karma']
    karman → ['rman', 'ka']
  tatsaṃyamād:
    tad → ['ta', 'd']
    saṃyama → ['yama', 'saṃ']
  aparāntajñānam:
    aparāntajñāna → ['aparānta', 'jñāna']
  ariṣṭebhyo:
    ariṣṭa → ['riṣṭa', 'a']
  vā:
    vā → ['vā']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------
Full-line total segments: 11
Word-by-word total segments: 10
Note: The two approaches differ by 1 segments

Sutra 141:
Original Text: sattvapuruṣayor atyantāsaṃkīrṇayoḥ pratyayāviśeṣo bhogaḥ parārthāt svārthasaṃyamāt puruṣajñānam 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  sattva → ['sat', 'tva']
  puruṣa → ['ruṣa', 'pu']
  atyanta → ['aty', 'anta']
  āsa → ['āsa']
  as → ['as']
  kīrṇa → ['kīrṇa']
  pratyaya → ['pratyaya']
  aviśeṣa → ['viśeṣa', 'a']
  bhoga → ['bhoga']
  parārtha → ['parārtha']
  svārtha → ['svārtha']
  saṃyama → ['yama', 'saṃ']
  jñāna → ['jñāna']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  sattvapuruṣayor:
    sattva → ['sat', 'tva']
    puruṣa → ['ruṣa', 'pu']
  atyantāsaṃkīrṇayoḥ:
    atyanta → ['aty', 'anta']
    asaṃkīrṇa → ['saṃkīrṇa', 'a']
  pratyayāviśeṣo:
    pratyaya → ['pratyaya']
    aviśeṣa → ['viśeṣa', 'a']
  bhogaḥ:
    bhoga → ['bhoga']
  parārthāt:
    parārtha → ['parārtha']
  svārthasaṃyamāt:
    svārtha → ['svārtha']
    saṃyama → ['yama', 'saṃ']

Sutra 148:
Original Text: kāyākāśayoḥ saṃbandhasaṃyamāl laghutūlasamāpatteś cākāśagamanam 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  ka → ['ka']
  kāya → ['kāya']
  ākāśa → ['kāśa', 'ā']
  bandh → ['bandh']
  saṃyama → ['yama', 'saṃ']
  laghu → ['laghu']
  tūla → ['tū', 'la']
  samāpatti → ['sam', 'āpatti']
  ca → ['ca']
  ākāśagamana → ['kāśa', 'gamana', 'ā']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  kāyākāśayoḥ:
    ka → ['ka']
    kāya → ['kāya']
    ākāśa → ['kāśa', 'ā']
  saṃbandhasaṃyamāl:
    bandh → ['bandh']
    saṃyama → ['yama', 'saṃ']
  laghutūlasamāpatteś:
    laghu → ['laghu']
    tūla → ['tū', 'la']
    samāpatti → ['sam', 'āpatti']
  cākāśagamanam:
    ca → ['ca']
    ākāśagamana → ['kāśa', 'gamana', 'ā']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------
Full-line total segments: 10
Word-by-word total segments: 10

================================================================================

Sutra 149:
Original Text: bahir akalpitā vṛttir mahāvidehā tataḥ prakāśāvaraṇakṣayaḥ 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  bahiḥ → ['bahiḥ']
  akalpita → ['kalpita', 'a']
  vṛtti → ['vṛtti']
  maha → ['maha']
  videha → ['deha', 'vi']
  tata → ['tata']
  prakāśa → ['kāśa', 'pra']
  āvaraṇa → ['varaṇa', 'ā']
  kṣaya → ['kṣa', 'ya']
  kṣi → ['kṣi']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  bahir:
    bahiḥ → ['bahiḥ']
  akalpitā:
    akalpita → ['kalpita', 'a']
  vṛttir:
    vṛtti → ['vṛtti']
  mahāvidehā:
    mahāvidehā → ['videhā', 'mahā']
  tataḥ:
    tata → ['tata']
  prakāśāvaraṇakṣayaḥ:
    prakāśa → ['kāśa', 'pra']
    āvaraṇa → ['varaṇa', 'ā']
    kṣaya → ['kṣa', 'ya']
    kṣi → ['kṣi']

Sutra 151:
Original Text: tato 'ṇimādiprādurbhāvaḥ kāyasaṃpat taddharmānabhighātaś ca

  aṇī → ['aṇī']
  mā → ['mā']
  asmad → ['asmad']

  ad → ['ad']

  kāya → ['kāya']
  sampad → ['sam', 'pad']

Sutra 155:

Sutra 170:
Original Text: jātideśakālavyavahitānām apy ānantaryaṃ smṛtisaṃskārayor ekarūpatvāt 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  jātī → ['jātī']
  deśakāla → ['deśa', 'kāla']
  vyavahita → ['vy', 'avahita']
  apya → ['pya', 'a']
  ap → ['p', 'a']
  ānantarya → ['ānantarya']
  smṛtisaṃskāra → ['saṃskāra', 'smṛti']
  ekarūpa → ['eka', 'rūpa']
  tva → ['tva']
  at → ['at']
  ad → ['ad']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  jātideśakālavyavahitānām:
    jātī → ['jātī']
    deśakāla → ['deśa', 'kāla']
    vyavahita → ['vy', 'avahita']
  apy:
    api → ['pi', 'a']
    apya → ['pya', 'a']
    ap → ['p', 'a']
  ānantaryaṃ:
    ānantarya → ['ānantarya']
  smṛtisaṃskārayor:
    smṛtisaṃskāra → ['saṃskāra', 'smṛti']
  ekarūpatvāt:
    ekarūpa → ['eka', 'rūpa']
    tva → ['tva']
    at → ['at']
    ad → ['ad']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------
Full-line total segments: 11
Word-by-word total segments: 12
Note: The two approaches differ by 1 segments

Sutra 192:
Original Text: tadā sarvāvaraṇamalāpetasya jñānasyānantyāj jñeyam alpam 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  tadā → ['tadā']
  sarva → ['sa', 'rva']
  avaraṇa → ['avaraṇa']
  malā → ['lā', 'ma']
  apeta → ['apeta']
  jñāna → ['jñāna']
  sya → ['sya']
  so → ['so']
  anantya → ['anantya']
  jñeya → ['jñeya']
  alpam → ['lpam', 'a']
  alpa → ['lpa', 'a']

---------------------

    tadā → ['tadā']
  sarvāvaraṇamalāpetasya:
    sarva → ['sa', 'rva']
    āvaraṇa → ['varaṇa', 'ā']
    mala → ['la', 'ma']
    apeta → ['apeta']
  jñānasyānantyāj:
    jñāna → ['jñāna']
    sya → ['sya']
    so → ['so']
    anantya → ['anantya']
  jñeyam:
    jñeya → ['jñeya']
  alpam:
    alpam → ['lpam', 'a']
    alpa → ['lpa', 'a']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------
Full-line total segments: 12
Word-by-word total segments: 12

================================================================================

Sutra 193:
Original Text: tataḥ kṛtārthānāṃ pariṇāmakramasamāptir guṇānām 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  tata → ['tata']
  kṛtārtha → ['kṛtārtha']
  pariṇāma → ['ṇāma', 'pari']
  krama → ['kra', 'ma']
  kram → ['kram']
  sama → ['sama']
  āpti → ['pti', 'ā']
  guṇa → ['guṇa']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  tataḥ:
    tata → ['tata']
  kṛtārthānāṃ:
    kṛtārtha → ['kṛtārtha']
  pariṇāmakramasamāptir:
    pariṇāma → ['ṇāma', 'pari']
    krama → ['kra', 'ma']
    kram → ['kram']
    samāpti → ['āpti', 'sa', 'm']
  guṇānām:
    guṇa → ['guṇa']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------
Full-line total segments: 8
Word-by-word total segments: 7
Note: The two approaches differ by 1 segments

================================================================================

Sutra 194:
Original Text: kṣaṇapratiyogī pariṇāmāparāntanirgrāhyaḥ kramaḥ 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  kṣaṇa → ['kṣaṇa']
  pratiyogin → ['yogin', 'prati']
  pariṇāma → ['ṇāma', 'pari']
  aparānta → ['aparānta']
  nirgrāhya → ['grāhya', 'nir']
  krama → ['kra', 'ma']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------

    kṣaṇa → ['kṣaṇa']
    pratiyogin → ['yogin', 'prati']

    pariṇāma → ['ṇāma', 'pari']
    aparānta → ['aparānta']
    nirgrāhya → ['grāhya', 'nir']

    krama → ['kra', 'ma']

Sutra 195:
Original Text: puruṣārthaśūnyānāṃ guṇānāṃ pratiprasavaḥ kaivalyaṃ svarūpapratiṣṭhā vā citiśaktir iti 

Full Line Analysis:
------------------
  puruṣārtha → ['puruṣārtha']
  śūnya → ['śūnya']
  guṇa → ['guṇa']
  pratiprasava → ['prasava', 'prati']
  kaivalya → ['kaivalya']
  svarūpa → ['sva', 'rūpa']
  pratiṣṭha → ['ṣṭha', 'prati']
  vā → ['vā']
  citī → ['citī']
  cit → ['ci', 't']
  śakti → ['kti', 'śakti', 'śa']
  iti → ['iti']

Word-by-Word Analysis:
---------------------
  puruṣārthaśūnyānāṃ:
    puruṣārtha → ['puruṣārtha']
    śūnya → ['śūnya']
  guṇānāṃ:
    guṇa → ['guṇa']
  pratiprasavaḥ:
    pratiprasava → ['prasava', 'prati']
  kaivalyaṃ:
    kaivalya → ['kaivalya']
  svarūpapratiṣṭhā:
    svarūpa → ['sva', 'rūpa']
    pratiṣṭha → ['ṣṭha', 'prati']
  vā:
    vā → ['vā']
  citiśaktir:
    citiśakti → ['citi', 'śakti']
  iti:
    iti → ['iti']

Comparison Metrics:
------------------

Word-by-word total segments: 10
Note: The two approaches differ by 2 segments
